name: Crabby Patti vs The World v2
name_original: Crabby Patti vs The World v2
description:
Hit from below to flip enemies, and then hurry to kick them!

CONTROLLERS: wasd or arrows to move, space to jump, enter to pause!

Still working on tweaking the animations, and getting it not to be a clone! Adding more mechanics, enemies, items, levels, and even some bosses! Keep an eye out : ))

CREDITS:

Title Music: “Silly Encounter”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Level 1 Music: “Coconut Land”, from PlayOnLoop.com

Level 2 Music: "Foggy forest", from PlayOnLoop.com

Level 3 Music: "Spooky Toyland", from PlayOnLoop.com
